titleStmt.title: CXLV expository sermons upon the whole 17th chapter of the Gospel according to St. John, or, Christs prayer before his passion explicated, and both practically and polemically improved by Anthony Burgess ...
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Abraham Miller for Thomas Underhill ...,

notesStmt.note: Pages 219-222, 273 are stained in filmed copy. Pages 200-285 photographed from University of Chicago Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
